Data: 6.50pm Sri Lanka win the toss and bowl for the third time this series.
Sanjaya to Dunk, SIX runs clears Siriwardana at wide long-on. Full on off, goes across the line and swings the ball over the leaping fielder. Tonked for six
Sanjaya to Dunk, no run Sanjaya replies with a leg-stump yorker, dug back to the bowler
Sanjaya to Dunk, no run a really full delivery outside off, jabbing drive to cover
Sanjaya to Dunk, no run wide yorker, Dunk can't slice it away square through the off side. Beaten

Sanjaya to Dunk, no run Sanjaya drops a return catch, this wasn't as straightforward as the one in the first over . Sanjaya clutches his left hand in pain. He grimaces. Full on the stumps, drilled back to the bowler. Sanjaya is okay to resume
Sanjaya to Dunk, 1 run full-toss on middle, hit to long-on
Shanaka to Dunk, 1 run floated on off stump, driven firmly to long-off
Shanaka to Klinger, 2 runs overpitched and outside off, carved out to backward point
Shanaka to Klinger, 2 runs full on the stumps, whipped away through midwicket
Shanaka to Klinger, no run legcutter outside off, grips in the surface. Klinger slashes early and is beaten by the lack of pace
Shanaka to Klinger, 1 run yorker just outside off, jammed out through extra cover
Shanaka to Dunk, 1 run full-toss, dragged to the left of the bowler, who makes a half-stop
Sanjaya to Dunk, 1 run low full-toss outside off, shovelled with the bottom hand to long-on
Sanjaya to Klinger, 1 leg bye full and fired into the leg stump, grazes the pad and rolls away to short fine leg
Sanjaya to Dunk, FOUR runs Dunk pre-meditates, shuffles across off, gets inside the line of a low full-toss on middle and scoops it right over Mendis' head
Sanjaya to Dunk, SIX runs finesse followed by violence. Sanjaya errs in length again. Too full on middle, Dunk smites it over midwicket for back-to-back boundaries
Sanjaya to Dunk, 1 run full and wide outside off, scythed away to sweeper cover
Sanjaya to Klinger, FOUR runs low full-toss, on middle, angled in, Klinger uses the angle and flicks it away to the midwicket boundary
Shanaka to Dunk, no run low full-toss on middle, swished to cover

Shanaka to Dunk, FOUR runs what was that? Superb improvisation. Dunk shuffles across off, he attempted to scoop it fine on the leg side initially. Then changes his mind and scoops it fine of short third man as this was pushed wide outside off. Quick hands
Shanaka to Dunk, no run dragged short and outside off, Dunk eyes up the leg side and mis-times it back to the bowler
Shanaka to Dunk, no run wide yorker, beats Dunk. He reaches out, slashes and misses
Shanaka to Dunk, no run off-stump yorker, squirted back to the bowler

Shanaka to Dunk, OUT Prasanna clings onto the catch, running back from point. Lands awkwardly on his elbow. Good length ball on off stump, Dunk looks to slog over midwicket. He ends up skewing it in the air. Prasanna hangs onto a swirling catch
Malinga to Klinger, (no ball) Malinga apologies, Klinger acknowledges it. Full-toss above the waist, the line is outside leg, the batsman ducks under it. That probably slipped out of Malinga's hands
Malinga to Klinger, 1 run nails a yorker on middle, dug through midwicket
Malinga to Head, SIX runs very full on the pads, Head picks the ball up and deposits it over square leg. Wonderful wristwork
Malinga to Head, SIX runs This is even better from Head. Malinga can't get the yorker right again. Full on off stump, right in the slot, launched over Siriwardana at long-on
Malinga to Head, 2 runs full-toss outside off, slapped to wide long-off for two
Malinga to Head, FOUR runs Malinga continues to err in length. Pitched up and outside off, Head lofts it nice and clean. Hit through the line straight of long-off
Malinga to Head, no run finally the yorker the line is on off, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball rolls away square on the leg side. 20 runs off the over
Kulasekara to Klinger, 1 run slower cutter outside off, 100.8ks, drags a slog-sweep to deep midwicket
Kulasekara to Head, no run yorker wide outside off, forced back to Kulasekara
Kulasekara to Head, 2 runs full and wide outside off, Head drops to one knee and crunches it over cover. Udana tears across from sweeper cover and flicks the ball into the field of play
Kulasekara to Head, 1 run full and outside off, sliced in the air, does not carry to long-off
Kulasekara to Klinger, FOUR runs full on middle and leg, whipped away fiercely between deep midwicket and deep square leg. Klinger gives it a proper thump
Kulasekara to Klinger, 2 runs Klinger gallops down the track, takes a full-toss and belts it to long-off
Kulasekara to Head, 1 run back of a length and outside off, tapped to cover
Kulasekara to Klinger, 1 run slower full ball outside off, bunted down the ground
Kulasekara to Head, 1 run off-stump length ball, Head hangs back and works it to deep midwicket
Kulasekara to Klinger, 2 runs very full on off, shovelled away to wide long-on
Kulasekara to Klinger, 1 run slower ball outside off, short, chopped to short third man
Kulasekara to Head, 1 run full on off, stroked to long-on
Shanaka to Head, 1 run
Shanaka to Klinger, 1 run low full-toss on off stump, whipped away to deep square leg
Shanaka to Head, 1 run really full on off stump, driven through the line to long-off for one

Shanaka to Klinger, FOUR runs Klinger scores his maiden international fifty. What a moment for him. Slower short ball outside off, he waits on the back foot, and powerfully swats it away to the left of deep midwicket
Shanaka to Klinger, 3 runs very full on the pads, fine leg is inside the circle, glanced away fine of the fielder. He dives and makes a half-save
Shanaka to Head, 2 runs Head jumps out of the crease and flicks a couple to deep midwicket. Good running, they get two
Malinga to Head, 2 runs full-toss outside off, thrashed away to long-off, where Kapu fumbles. Easy two in the end for the hosts
Malinga to Head, OUT Kapu overruns the ball but hangs onto the catch at long-off. Low full-toss outside off, Head loses his shape, swings and holes out in the deep

Malinga to Klinger, 1 run, OUT thigh-high full-toss, Klinger swats it away through square leg. Klinger commits to two. Shanka swoops down on the ball from deep square leg and throws it flat to Kusal Mendis. He collects it and swipes the bails off to catch Klinger short on the second. He raises his bat and walks back for 62
Malinga to Turner, 1 run full-toss on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket

Malinga to Henriques, 1 run The batsman comes down the track, this is full and wide outside off, cracked to Udana at extra cover. They take off for the single. Udana can't throw the stumps down at the non-striker's end. Malinga did not back up

Malinga to Turner, OUT Kapu pulls off a cracking catch now. He dashes in from long-on, dives forward, and takes it. Turner backs away outside leg. Malinga chases him and cramps him with a full-toss which is dragged away to Kapu. He did well to attack the catch
Shanaka to Faulkner, 2 runs low full-toss on off, flat-batted to long-on
Shanaka to Faulkner, OUT Australia have lost four wickets for five runs. Third catch for Kapu in the deep. Faulkner can't get hold of this full-toss outside off. He miscues it to long-on
Shanaka to Henriques, 1 leg bye full and sliding into the pads, misses the flick, they sneak a legbye
Shanaka to Paine, no run slower full ball wide outside off, Paine, having stepped outside leg, can't connect
Shanaka to Paine, 1 run full-toss on off stump, swiped away to deep midwicket
Shanaka to Henriques, 1 run really full and wide outside off, carved away to point. Excellent final over from Shanaka

9pm So Sri Lanka need 188 to whitewash Australia. The hosts lost four wickets for five runs at the back end, but contrasting fifties from Finch, who was dropped on 0, and Klinger at the top gave Australia some cushion. We will be back in a bit for the chase.
9.17pm Welcome back. Turner has the new ball. Tharanga are Munaweera are SL's openers.
Turner to Munaweera, no run flat and skids on outside off, chopped to cover on the back foot
Turner to Munaweera, 3 runs much slower through the air outside off, this is chopped away fine of backward point
Turner to Upul Tharanga, 1 wide angling down the leg side from around the wicket, leg-side wide. Did that brush the pad? Yep, hotspot detects it brushed the flap on its way down the leg side
Turner to Upul Tharanga, no run straight ball on off, 91.6ks, played back to the bowler
Turner to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs tossed up on leg stump, backs away outside leg and drives it inside-out over the covers. Lovely shot
Turner to Upul Tharanga, no run
Turner to Upul Tharanga, no run pushed through quicker, slides in from around the wicket, Tharanga plays across the line and is rapped on the pad but this was heading past the leg stump
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, SIX runs back of a length on middle, Munaweera ventures deep in the crease and biffs it over long-on for a six
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, no run Munaweera moves outside leg, Richardson follows him with a 141ks yorker, sneaks under the legs of the batsman. Superb save from Paine
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, SIX runs length ball angled in towards the leg stump, Munaweera sits back and smashes it over square leg for his second six in three balls
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, FOUR runs slower full ball on middle, Munaweera swings early and ends up miscuing the ball over the bowler's head. It still goes to the boundary
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, 1 wide really full and slanting down leg past the flick. Wide. Richardson under pressure in his second international
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, 1 run Munaweera backs away outside leg. This is pushed wide outside off, carved in the air square of deep third man
Jhye Richardson to Upul Tharanga, 2 runs hip-high short ball outside off, Tharanga swats it on the back foot to the left of mid-on

Cummins to Munaweera, 1 run Zampa drops it at deep third man. Cummins could have had Munaweera with his first ball. Chest-high short ball just outside off. Munaweera jumps off the ground and ramps it in the air. Zampa back-pedals and loses his balance. Straight in and straight out
Cummins to Upul Tharanga, no run full and angling away past the outside edgfe at 144.4ks. Pace like fire
Cummins to Upul Tharanga, 2 runs short on the leg stump, tucks 'em up for room. Deflected fine on the leg side
Cummins to Upul Tharanga, 1 leg bye 145.4ks missile on the leg stump, Tharanga is beaten for pace. The ball grazes the thigh and rolls to the leg side
Cummins to Munaweera, 1 wide short and angled in, Cummins hits the deck hard and gets it to bounce big. Left alone. Too high and that's a wide
Cummins to Munaweera, no run 145.5ks, full on middle, held up in the pitch a bit. Munaweera nearly chips a catch to mid-on
Cummins to Munaweera, 2 runs very full on the leg stump, 145.9ks, shovelled away past midwicket
Faulkner to Upul Tharanga, no run starts off with a yorker outside off, squirted out towards point with an angled bat
Faulkner to Upul Tharanga, SIX runs pretty full on off stump, that's just a chip from Tharanga. Mid-on is inside the circle. It disappears over the boundary. That's some shot
Faulkner to Upul Tharanga, no run middle-stump yorker, excellent response from Faulkner, dug out
Faulkner to Munaweera, 1 run hip-high short ball on the leg stump, swatted straight to short fine leg. Faulkner gets away
Faulkner to Mendis, 1 run good length and angling away outside off, sliced down to third man
Turner to Mendis, no run non-turning offbreak on off, played to the right of the bowler
Turner to Mendis, 1 run shortish on middle, pulled away to deep square leg
Turner to Munaweera, no run fired on middle, short again, backs away and flashes to cover
Turner to Munaweera, 1 run good length on middle, ventures across off and scoops it over the keeper's head
Turner to Mendis, FOUR runs pitched up and outside off, Mendis drops to one knee and slogs it over the bowler's head. He aimed midwicket and it went straight
Turner to Mendis, 1 run 92ks flatter and quicker on the stumps, hit into the vacant spaces in the leg side
Henriques to Mendis, 1 run good length and angled in on off, seam-up, tapped to midwicket
Henriques to Munaweera, no run back of a length and skids on outside off, Munaweera steps away outside leg, reaches out for the ball. Slashes and misses
Henriques to Munaweera, no run Munaweera jumps down the track and swings. The length was shorter with Henriques beating the batsman again
Henriques to Munaweera, FOUR runs hip-high short ball on the off stump, swatted away to the right of deep square leg
Henriques to Munaweera, FOUR runs 113.9ks slower ball outside off, very full, drilled away to the right of Finch at mid-off
Henriques to Munaweera, 1 run short of a length and outside off, chopped to point
Zampa to Munaweera, no run quick fizzer on off, mis-hit back to the bowler
Zampa to Munaweera, no run full and hurries on to beat the inside edge and rap the pad
Zampa to Munaweera, no run pushed through on middle, backs away and punches to cover
Zampa to Munaweera, 1 run slider on off, chopped from there to short third man

Zampa to Mendis, FOUR runs dragged short on the off stump, goes deep in the crease and pulls over midwicket. Faulkner runs in and attacks the ball as opposed to sitting back and taking it on the bounce. The ball beats him to the boundary
Zampa to Mendis, 1 run
Jhye Richardson to Mendis, 1 run full slower ball on middle, Mendis slog-sweeps early and does not connect. The ball brushes the pad and rolls to long leg
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, 1 run tight line on off, slower ball again, opens the face and dinks a single to point
Jhye Richardson to Munaweera, 1 run back of a length and outside off, angled out to point

Jhye Richardson to Gunaratne, no run short and outside off, 142.5ks, Asela was caught between playing and leaving. Nearly chopped this cross-seamer back onto the stumps. Paine puts in another diving save
Jhye Richardson to Gunaratne, no run full and angled in on off, jammed out to the leg side
Head to Gunaratne, 1 run skids on off, dabbed to cover
Head to Siriwardana, no run speared outside off, punched to point
Head to Siriwardana, 1 run slider on middle, chopped to cover for one
Head to Gunaratne, 3 runs full and angling across off, slashed in the air fine of backward point
Head to Siriwardana, 1 run very full on middle, Siriwardana makes room and hammers this down to long-off
Zampa to Siriwardana, no run pitches on middle and leg and rips away outside off past the outside edge. Siriwardana did not pick the googly. Beaten
Zampa to Siriwardana, 1 run
Zampa to Kapugedera, no run length ball on off, defended
Zampa to Kapugedera, 1 run looped up on off, slugged away to long-on

Zampa to Siriwardana, 1 run Henriques puts it down at backward point. Tossed up and turns away outside off, googly. Siriwardana slices in the air, Henriques leaps across to his left, the ball evades his outstretched hand. He can't snatch it on the rebound either
Head to Siriwardana, 1 run
Head to Kapugedera, 1 wide floated down the leg side, wide
Head to Kapugedera, 1 run slides across off, chopped away for one
Head to Siriwardana, 1 run down the track, meets a full-toss, and hits it back to the bowler. Head takes some pace off it and grimaces in pain
Head to Kapugedera, FOUR runs reverse-swept from middle stump to the point boundary. The fast hands from Kapu was the key to this shot
Head to Kapugedera, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, heaved away to deep square leg
Head to Siriwardana, 1 run down the track, this is short, inside-edged down to long-on
Zampa to Siriwardana, 2 runs
Zampa to Siriwardana, no run slower wrong'un from Zampa, Siri slogs and does not connect. Beaten
Zampa to Siriwardana, 1 run slower through the air outside off, 73ks, chips a drive to long-off
Zampa to Shanaka, no run turn and bounce outside off, beats the outside edge
Cummins to Siriwardana, no run back of a length on middle, opens the bat-face and plays to point
Cummins to Siriwardana, FOUR runs length ball on off, clubbed away to the left of long-on. Nearly went all the way for a six
Cummins to Siriwardana, 1 run full on middle and leg, hangs back and whips to deep midwicket
Cummins to Prasanna, no run back of a length and outside off, guided to point
Cummins to Prasanna, 1 wide bouncer on middle, ducks under it. Too high, called a wide
Cummins to Prasanna, no run good length on off, defended back to the bowler
Cummins to Prasanna, 2 runs short and wide outside off, slashed in the air past backward point
Zampa to Siriwardana, SIX runs tossed up outside off, Siriwardana backs away and nails it over the covers for a six
Zampa to Siriwardana, 1 run lobbed up on middle, just 79ks, driven down the ground
Zampa to Prasanna, 1 run Prasanna goes low for the slog-sweep. He only manages an inside edge to short fine leg
Zampa to Siriwardana, no run turn and bounce for Zampa. Siriwardana aims a reverse-sweep and sees the ball hit his chest
Zampa to Siriwardana, 1 run really full on the leg stump, whipped through midwicket
Zampa to Prasanna, FOUR runs short legbreak outside off, Prasanna rocks back and flashes a cut in the air between backward point and cover
Faulkner to Siriwardana, 1 run back of length and well outside off, dabbed towards backward point for a single
Faulkner to Prasanna, FOUR runs sliding down the leg side, shortish length, Prasanna slaps that behind deep backward square leg for four
Faulkner to Prasanna, 1 wide slower on from Faulkner, slips down the leg side for a wide, Prasanna looked to thwack that behind square leg for four
Faulkner to Prasanna, 1 run pitched up and around off, squeezed away towards backward point
Faulkner to Siriwardana, 1 run another loopy slower one from Faulkner, quite full and wide, batsman throws his bat at it, can't get it past cover point though

Faulkner to Kulasekara, 1 leg bye pitched up and angling into the pads, did Kula get an inside edge on that? big appeal for lbw as it hits the pads, might have been sliding down, the ball rolls towards gully
Jhye Richardson to Kulasekara, 1 run back of length ball just outside off, guided toward backward point for a single
Jhye Richardson to Siriwardana, 1 wide sharp short ball, just down the leg side though, called a wide, batsman had ducked under that
Jhye Richardson to Siriwardana, SIX runs sweet shot from Siriwardana, short of length ball, swings and connects peerfectly, the ball sail over the midwicket boundary
Jhye Richardson to Siriwardana, 1 run fuller, thumped towards mid-on for a quick single

Jhye Richardson to Kulasekara, FOUR runs shot! perfectly struck straight drive from Kulasekara, powers that length ball so straight that it hits the stumps at the other end, still there's enough energy on the ball to run away past mid-on for four
Jhye Richardson to Kulasekara, 1 run
Jhye Richardson to Siriwardana, 1 run pitched up and on middle, Siriwardana backs away from the stumps and pushes the ball towards mid-off for a single

Faulkner to Siriwardana, 2 runs dipping full-toss on the leg stump following Siriwardana who was backing away outside the leg stump. This is bunted in the gap at the covers. Two runs in the end. Good running
Faulkner to Siriwardana, no run another slower delivery from the back of the hand. That's Faulkner's go-to ball. Siriwardana swishes and misses outside off
Faulkner to Kulasekara, 1 run good length and angling away outside off, Kulasekara opens the bat-face and pats it to point
Faulkner to Malinga, 1 run 113.5ks slower ball cutting away outside off, pushed towards mid-off
Faulkner to Kulasekara, no run slower short ball on middle, played back to the bowler. Fine over from Faulkner
Cummins to Malinga, no run 142.3ks good length ball on middle, Malinga makes room outside leg and pushes the ball straight to cover
Cummins to Kulasekara, 1 run full on leg stump, clipped away to deep square leg
Cummins to Sanjaya, FOUR runs full and outside off, clears his front leg and crunches it through the covers
Cummins to Sanjaya, no run dug in short and angled in, Sanjaya is beaten for pace and is pinged on the glove or the arm guard

Tharanga collects the trophy. The Sri Lankan players get up on the podium and pose for the cameras. Some loud roars there as well. They have had a difficult couple of months. That wraps up our coverage as well. Thanks for tuning in. Night.

10.40pm Australia secure their first T20I win over Sri Lanka at home in six attempts. Finch and Klinger set it up for them with contrasting fifties, then Zampa and Faulkner cut through Sri Lanka's batting line-up in the chase. Zampa's variations were particularly impressive; he even brought out the front-of-the-hand flipper. A brace of run-outs then hastened Sri Lanka's loss. The visitors, however, take the series 2-1.
Australia won by 41 runs
Player of the match is Adam Zampa, AUS
